title: Inside Man

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- 3 times per game you may plant a keylogger on the target machine. Retrieving a keylogger will increase NETSEC's hacking chances towards your target.
- Twice per game, you may follow another player and learn who they'll visit tonight.
- If you spawn, a random node will belong to you and if discovered, will automatically be hacked. This WILL be a laptop and cannot be either one of the first nodes or the Master Node.
- You may check the dumpsters and trash bins for important information. This will decrease the difficulty of a random node when successful
- Once per game, you may become an Improvised Hacker(Post 2174). You will retain all your attributes. Available N3 onwards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You passively know who the REF visits every night.
- If you spawn, the REF cannot use private chats or whisper to each other until you die. You will be listed as an REF on the faction member list with a random yet plausible role. This does not work on REFs with a set amount of roles. (I.E: Last)

desc:
Post 2169
*You don't have high-level clearance within the REF, but hey, it's better than being unauthorized, right?*
